feedback.fit: The loose, flowy fit of the dress is perfect for a casual summer look. It drapes nicely on the body.
feedback.color: The watercolor print in shades of yellow and green is eye-catching and suits the boho style well.
feedback.footwear: The strappy wedge sandals elongate the legs and pair nicely with the dress for a put-together look.
feedback.accessories: The beaded necklace and fringe bag add to the free-spirited boho vibe.
feedback.style: Overall, this is a stylish boho chic outfit that's ideal for casual summer days or events.

feedback.fit: The oversized fit of the trench coat pairs well with the fitted tank and skinny jeans for a balanced silhouette.
feedback.color: The neutral beige coat allows the olive green and burgundy to take center stage for a nice fall color palette.
feedback.footwear: The lace-up wedge sneakers add a casual, comfortable element to the look.
feedback.accessories: The fedora hat tops off the outfit nicely and suits the overall casual chic style.
feedback.style: This look expertly mixes casual and chic elements for a stylish everyday fall outfit.

feedback.fit: The fitted top and flared skirt create an attractive silhouette, but the short length makes it a bit revealing for some occasions.
feedback.color: The purple and magenta color-blocking on the top is bold and makes a statement, but may not be to everyone's taste.
feedback.footwear: The black pointed-toe pumps are a classic choice but seem slightly dressy for the overall casual look.
feedback.accessories: The outfit could be elevated with the addition of some simple jewelry, like a pendant necklace or stud earrings.
feedback.style: The look has a flirty, youthful vibe that would be great for a casual night out, but the short skirt limits its versatility.

feedback.fit: The loose t-shirt and flowy wide leg pants create a comfortable, effortless look that's perfect for casual summer days.
feedback.color: The classic combination of white, navy and pops of red gives the outfit a crisp, nautical-inspired aesthetic.
feedback.footwear: The red slip-on sneakers add a fun, colorful accent and keep the look casual and easy to move in.
feedback.accessories: The straw hat, round sunglasses and red bag enhance the summery nautical vibe and make the simple outfit more visually interesting.
feedback.style: This is a great example of casual summer style, with its nautical color scheme and breezy silhouette. Ideal for a beach day or weekend outing.

feedback.fit: The loose, airy blouse balances nicely with the more fitted high-waisted shorts for a relaxed but put-together silhouette.
feedback.color: The classic navy and white color palette feels fresh and appropriate for summer, with a hint of green for added interest.
feedback.footwear: The black wedge sandals are a versatile choice that dresses up the shorts a bit while still being comfortable.
feedback.accessories: The woven straw tote is a perfect casual summer bag that complements the preppy shorts.
feedback.style: This outfit has a polished, preppy look that's great for a variety of casual summer occasions, from a picnic to shopping.

feedback.fit: The oversized plaid shirt worn loosely over the distressed shorts creates a very casual, undone look.
feedback.color: The blue plaid and medium wash denim are a classic casual combo, but there's not much contrast or visual interest in the color palette.
feedback.footwear: The brown wedge sandals seem a bit heavy for the light, summery outfit. A lighter shoe would be more cohesive.
feedback.accessories: The straw hat and tan bag enhance the laid-back, slightly western vibe and add some needed texture to the look.
feedback.style: This outfit captures an easy, thrown-on casual style but borders on sloppy. More thoughtful styling could elevate it.

labels.fit: Loose plaid shirt, fitted denim shorts

feedback.fit: The oversized boyfriend-style plaid shirt contrasts nicely with the slim-fitting cuffed shorts for a stylish borrowed-from-the-boys look.
feedback.color: The light blue and white plaid pairs perfectly with the medium wash denim. Brown accessories add a touch of warmth.
feedback.footwear: The brown oxford flats are an unexpected menswear-inspired choice that works really well with the preppy tomboy aesthetic.
feedback.accessories: The leather satchel and simple silver watch complete the scholarly vibe without competing with the plaid.
feedback.style: This is a fantastic example of preppy tomboy style - polished and put-together but with a relaxed, slightly masculine edge.

feedback.fit: The oversized sweater and short flared skirt create a cute, flirty silhouette. The volume on top balances the leg-baring bottom.
feedback.color: The light gray sweater is a nice neutral that allows the rich purple skirt to pop. Black accessories ground the look.
feedback.footwear: The black ankle boots transition this outfit seamlessly into fall and add a bit of edge to the feminine pieces.
feedback.accessories: The small black clutch and delicate silver bracelet are understated choices that complement the outfit without overwhelming it.
feedback.style: This is a great go-to cute casual look for fall when you want to look pretty and put-together but still relaxed.

labels.fit: Loose lace top, fitted denim shorts

feedback.fit: The loose, flowy lace top with the more fitted denim shorts makes for an easy, effortless silhouette.
feedback.color: The all-white top with blue denim is a classic combo but a bit plain. This look could use another color to liven it up.
feedback.footwear: The brown ankle boots are a slightly unexpected choice with the white lace and give the outfit a boho twist.
feedback.accessories: The black crossbody bag is functional and works fine with the outfit but doesn't really enhance the overall look.
feedback.style: This outfit has potential as a cute boho-inspired summer look but needs some thoughtful accessorizing to really shine.

feedback.fit: The loose band tee with slim denim shorts is a standard casual combo, but the oversized fit of the tee looks a bit sloppy.
feedback.color: The stark black and white graphic tee could use some color to make this outfit more visually interesting.
feedback.footwear: The brown oxford shoes seem like an oddly preppy choice for the edgy band tee and distressed shorts.
feedback.accessories: This outfit is crying out for some accessories - layered jewelry, a belt, or a hat could take it from plain to cool.
feedback.style: The band tee and distressed shorts have an edgy rocker vibe, but the styling falls flat. With better fit and accessories, this could be a great look.
